farms.name: Jele
farms.description: Jele is my first file and Maru my first love

farms.name: Jenny
farms.description: Jenny is the second file, she was quite fast and efficient. She also dated all the singles before she married Sebastian

farms.name: Chillda
farms.description: Chillda was the chilled run. Right now she's overworking herself and building a Megafarm. 1.5k crops are too much to handle

farms.name: Elise
farms.description: Elise is a Hearthstone character and i want her farm to be Un'Goro themed. That means i mainly farm Ancient Fruit and Dinos. She also could finish the CC in year one (and she is a man by mistake)

farms.name: Johnny T.
farms.description: Johnny T. is the evil and funky Joja run, I am really looking forward to being mean to the whole city.
